resources.string: Please confirm that you have read and agreed to
The network is not available. Please check your network settings
A new home for your LinkupHome devices.\nPlease name it.
Do you want to disconnect and delete device?
1.Please ensure the device has been properly installed and turned on.\n2. If the device has been used by others, please make sure it was successfully reset.
Please firstly try following two shortcuts:
Way 1: Turn off bluetooth on your phone, then turn on it again.\nWay 2: Exit the App completely from the background system, then restart the App.
If you\'re still unable to find devices after trying two shortcuts, follow the steps below to reset your device.

If you have connected this device, but now it is lose control, please delete this unworkable device info in the “Device” list.\n\nIf this is your first time to connect this device, please ignore Step 1 and move on Step 2.

Please use the switch to reset device:
1. Switch off the light
2. Switch on the light, then switch off the light after 1-2 seconds.
3. Switch on the light again, then switch off the light after 1-2 seconds.
4. Switch light on the third time, when the light flash 3 times, it means the device is reset to defaults.

* If no light flashes 3 times, please repeat above steps until reset successfully.
* Do not turn on and off lights too fast, usually every 1-2 seconds.
If the device is not found within 10 seconds, please try to reset the device.
Create a room, easy manage devices
Do you want to delete current room?
The modified data has not been saved, are you sure to exit?
Tap here , add available devices to the room
The sharing function only can be available when connect to the network. Please make sure the WiFi or network is turned on in mobile phone.
Share the automatically generated invitation code with your family and friends.
The invitee also needs to connect to the network, enter into "join a home" and input the invitation code to control the lights together.
Request home host to create invitation code and share it with you. (settings → share a home→ select a home → generate invitation code→ share invitation code)

Notes: if several persons want to control lights toghter, please make sure the lights (need to be turned on) no less than mobile devices (mobile phones/IPADs). Otherwise, some mobile devices cannot connect and control the lights. It means how many lights on, how many persons can control toghter.
Sorry, the invitation code is wrong or not exist.
Devices in the current home are still connected, please go to the device list to delete devices one by one, then you can delete the current home.
Please reserve at least one home for adding devices
Do you want to quit the sharing home?
Connection fails. Please restart the device to connect.
